H0.text: who is the prime minister of spain 2011. José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero

H1.text: who is the prime minister of spain 2011. Alfredo Pérez Rubalcaba

H2.text: who is the prime minister of spain 2011. José María Aznar

H3.text: who is the prime minister of spain 2011. Mariano Rajoy

A4.text: Mariano Rajoy Brey served as Prime Minister of Spain from 2011 to 2018.

A5.text: Rajoy was elected by Parliament on 20 December 2011 and sworn in as prime minister the next day.
